entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
